Improvements in stability.

We have made a number of minor game improvements to give you a better game experience. Enjoy the game and have fun!

Can you encounter a crime bigger than a murder?

No rest for the alpine hotel, as disasters seem to like it even more than tourists. Not much time has passed and the owner is forced to look for your help once again. His friend and business partner i

Celebrate the holidays with Murder in the Alps and try the exciting new Winter Holidays Event! After a busy year, including the last journey to Porto Ceso in June 1933, it is now time for Anna to stay at home and celebrate the winter holidays together wit

A few months after the tragic events of the Molinelli case, Anna must go to Milan for the trial of Osvald Bernstein. On the way, she stops for a week-long vacation in the beautiful surroundings of Porto Ceso. But this town never ceases to amaze with its d
Minor bug fixes

It's time to get into the festive mood and visit the Travelling Carnival Event which has just arrived with a new update! Have fun with various attractions and challenges, show your skills, climb the leaderboard, and have a great time at the Travelling Car

Various minor improvements to make your gaming experience better.
Be sure your game is up to date so you can have the best time playing!

We also recommend joining our community on Facebook for various Contests & more fun.
